header: सबसे एडवांस्ड माइनक्राफ्ट बोट डिस्कॉर्ड के लिए।
subheader: क्रैफ्टी बोहुत जरुरी है आपके माइनक्राफ्ट्र कम्युनिटी के लिए।

example1.subheader: Crafty allows you to view information about a Minecraft account, with a simple command

example2.subheader: With Crafty, you're also able to view Server Information, without ever leaving Discord

example3.subheader: Crafty makes it possible for you to view Player statistics from popular Minecraft servers

example4.header: Play Minecraft Trivia with your friends
example4.subheader: Crafty brings all the entertainment to your Discord server. Play Minecraft trivia, view fun facts, have epic Minecraft inspired battles, and so much more!

prettyCoolRight: Get access to all these cool features by adding Crafty to your Discord server
